EmailTemplate.description: Informs to Owner of the Case about the change in priority of the case.
EmailTemplate.name: 11. Case Escalation (Priority Change to P1)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Priority has changed to P1 for Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Case.Case_Owner_Manager__c},
Case ({!Case.CaseNumber}) has been escalated to a high.
Sincerely,
Mainfreight San Francisco Support Team
[{!Case.Thread_Id}]
